Package Networking

Class ClientService

java.lang.Object
Networking.ClientService
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Connects and transfers information between client and server

    void disconnect​(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> deadCells)
    Called when user disconnects

    void fireUpdateEvent​(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> cells)
    Fires update event
    java.util.ArrayList<Cell> getUpdate()
    Get the updated cells that was received from the server and then set them to null
    java.lang.Object[] initializeGame()
    Receives initializing information for Game to set up The format returned will be [grid, snake spawn location (cell), goal score (int)] These will always be sent upon client's connection to the server
    void lose​(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> deadCells)
    Called when player loses, sends dead cells of snake and lost event (Made synchronized since if user abruptly disconnects and loses at the same time, this method may be called at same time)
    void run()
    Main run method for client Listens for objects from server and handles appropriately
    void sendChat​(ChatEvent chat)
    Sends chat over to server
    void sendUpdate​(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> obj)
    Sends object over to server (Made synchronized since is used for Game Updates and also Chat, so there's possibility of accessing at same time)
    void setChatListener​(ChatListener chatListener)
    Sets ChatListener
    void setLock​(Game lock)
    Sets the lock used for when client is waiting for update Used in unblocking game, when update is finally received
    void setServerConnectionListener​(ServerConnectionListener serverConnectionListener)
    Set serverConnectionListener There may be a connected event queued up already before this being set, thus if so, fire that event
    void setServerListener​(ServerListener serverListener)
    Sets serverListener
    void spectateMode()
    Used after players loses, now directly receives cells
    void win()
    Called when player wins, sends win event

      Constructor
      Parameters:
      ip - ip of server
      port - port of server
      name - name to be displayed

  • Method Details

    • initializeGame

      public java.lang.Object[] initializeGame()
      Receives initializing information for Game to set up The format returned will be [grid, snake spawn location (cell), goal score (int)] These will always be sent upon client's connection to the server
      Returns:
      initialization data

    • sendUpdate

      public void sendUpdate​(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> obj)
      Sends object over to server (Made synchronized since is used for Game Updates and also Chat, so there's possibility of accessing at same time)
      Parameters:
      obj - obj to be sent

    • sendChat

      public void sendChat​(ChatEvent chat)
      Sends chat over to server
      Parameters:
      chat - ChatEvent that holds message of chat sent

    • lose

      public void lose​(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> deadCells)
      Called when player loses, sends dead cells of snake and lost event (Made synchronized since if user abruptly disconnects and loses at the same time, this method may be called at same time)
      Parameters:
      deadCells -

    • win

      public void win()
      Called when player wins, sends win event

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect​(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> deadCells)
      Called when user disconnects
      Parameters:
      deadCells - cells of the now dead snake

    • getUpdate

      public java.util.ArrayList<Cell> getUpdate()
      Get the updated cells that was received from the server and then set them to null
      Returns:
      update the updated cells from the server

    • setLock

      public void setLock​(Game lock)
      Sets the lock used for when client is waiting for update Used in unblocking game, when update is finally received
      Parameters:
      lock -

    • setChatListener

      public void setChatListener​(ChatListener chatListener)
      Sets ChatListener
      Parameters:
      chatListener - Listens for chat messages from server and then sends over directly to GUI

    • setServerConnectionListener

      public void setServerConnectionListener​(ServerConnectionListener serverConnectionListener)
      Set serverConnectionListener There may be a connected event queued up already before this being set, thus if so, fire that event
      Parameters:
      serverConnectionListener - Listens for disruptions in the server connection and sends over directly to GUI to directly respond

    • setServerListener

      public void setServerListener​(ServerListener serverListener)
      Sets serverListener
      Parameters:
      serverListener - Listens for updates in the server (these updates can be cell updates (only used in waiting phase and spectate phase, before game started) or GameState events

    • fireChatEvent

      public void fireChatEvent​(ChatEvent chatEvent)
      Fires chat event
      Parameters:
      chatEvent - a chat message from another client

    • fireUpdateEvent

      public void fireUpdateEvent​(Cell cell)
      Fires update event (only used in waiting phase and spectate mode)
      Parameters:
      cell - updated cell

    • fireUpdateEvent

      public void fireUpdateEvent​(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> cells)
      Fires update event
      Parameters:
      cells - updated cells

    • fireGameStateEvent

      public void fireGameStateEvent​(GameStateEvent gameStateEvent)
      Fire game state event
      Parameters:
      gameStateEvent - a change in game state (win, lose, tie)

    • fireServerConnectionEvent

      public void fireServerConnectionEvent​(ServerConnectionEvent serverConnectionEvent)
      Fires server connection event
      Parameters:
      serverConnectionEvent - a disrupt in the connection with the server

    • spectateMode

      public void spectateMode()
      Used after players loses, now directly receives cells

    • run

      public void run()
      Main run method for client Listens for objects from server and handles appropriately
